newsitem.title: USA: Union Pacific spinoff to join S&P 500.
newsitem.headline: Union Pacific spinoff to join S&P 500.

text.p: Standard & Poor's said on Monday it will add Union Pacific Resources Group Inc to the S&P 500 Index after the close of trading on October 15, 1996.
Union Pacific Corp is spinning off its 83 percent stake in Union Pacific Resources to its shareholders on that date.
Community Psychiatric Centers will be removed from the S&P 500, Standard & Poor's said.
Also, Standard & Poor's said it will replace Waterhouse Investor Services Inc in the SmallCap 600 Index with Logicon Inc after the close of trading on October 15, 1996.
